name: EM310-UDL
description: Milesight EM310-UDL is a LoRa ultrasonic distance sensor mainlyfor the detection of waste bin and other container's fill level. With a compact size and wide measure range, EM310-UDL can be installed to any types of waste bins or containers to monitor solid or liquid level. Besides, EM310-UDL equips with 3-axis accelerometer to detect the status of container cover.
author: Akenza AG
